title: ROBOTIKA (2005-2009) (Archaia) COMPLETE
description:
A steampunk sushi samurai western about loyalty, honor and revenge, in a world populated by silent samurai, fast-talking geisha, deadly mecha-betsushikime, digital djihits, morphing butterflies, and corporate corruption.

Niko, a member of the elite bodyguard corps dedicated to protecting the queen, is sent on a mission to recover a stolen invention that in the wrong hands could trigger a bloody civil war. Violence and chaos reign everywhere on the fringes of a "civilized" society where few couldn't care less about Niko and his mission...

------

About reading order -- Robotika #1-4, then the Extras from the Robotika hardcover, then Robotika: For a Few Rubles More #1&2 (weird double issue, see below), and finally Robotika: For a Few Rubles More #3&4.

Publication shenanigans -- The 2nd issue of the 2nd miniseries was so late that Archaia released #2 (when it was finally ready) with a built-in reprint of #1, and then packaged #3-4 together the same way.

I also included a scan of the 1st printing of For a Few Rubles More #1, just for completists.

Please seed and share. --STF
